name: bootstrap
description: Default Theme based on bootstrap as a template for individual website creation. It's responsive, mobile first for projects on the web.

scripts.clean-css: cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output style.min.css style.css && cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output style-grid.min.css style-grid.css && cleancss --skip-advanced --source-map --output normalize.min.css normalize.css
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 sass/style.scss style.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 sass/style-grid.scss style-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 sass/normalize.scss normalize.css
